hero.title: Redefining Parking Space Rental Experience
hero.description: We are committed to building a decentralized parking space rental ecosystem, providing transparent, secure, and efficient Web3 travel services through blockchain technology

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Connecting traditional car rental with the Web3 world, building a new paradigm for decentralized parking asset circulation

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Create a highly deterministic Web3 travel ecosystem and become the world's leading decentralized parking asset management platform

technology.title: Parking Chain Technology
technology.subtitle: Leading Industry Innovation, Creating New Smart Rental Ecosystem

blockchain.title: Blockchain Technology
blockchain.description: Adopting advanced blockchain technology to ensure transaction transparency and data security, providing a reliable rental service platform for users

smartContract.title: Smart Contracts
smartContract.description: Automating rental processes through smart contracts, improving efficiency while ensuring transaction fairness and security

digitalIdentity.title: Digital Identity
digitalIdentity.description: Innovative digital identity authentication system, providing secure and convenient identity verification and credit assessment for users

story.title: Our Story
story.description1: Founded in 2024, we have always adhered to the service concept of 'Customer First'. We have an industry-leading parking space management system and professional service team, providing comprehensive parking space rental solutions for customers.
story.description2: From the initial dozens of parking spaces to today's nationwide rental network, we never forget our original intention and continue to innovate, striving to create China's most trusted parking space rental brand.

contact.title: About Us
contact.intro: Since its launch, the parking space rental platform has been dedicated to providing high-quality, convenient parking space rental services to our customers.
contact.thanks: Thank you for choosing our parking space rental service! If you have any questions or need assistance during use, please feel free to contact us through the following methods.
contact.commitment: We are committed to providing you with the highest quality service. Your satisfaction is our greatest motivation. Looking forward to hearing from you!

upload.imageType: You can only upload JPG/PNG file!

basicPolicy.title: Basic Policies
basicPolicy.intro1: Since its launch, the parking space rental platform has been dedicated to providing high-quality, convenient parking space rental services.
basicPolicy.intro2: As a professional parking space rental platform, we are committed to meeting various customer parking needs and providing the most suitable rental solutions.
basicPolicy.welcome: Welcome to use our parking space rental service! To ensure you can use our services smoothly and pleasantly, please read the following policy content carefully:

rental.title: 1. Rental Policy
rental.content:
Rental Period: The parking space rental period starts from the effective date until the end of the rental. If renewal is needed, please contact customer service [3] days in advance to process the renewal.
Early Termination: If early termination is needed, written notice must be given [3] days in advance, and corresponding penalty fees must be paid. For specific penalty amounts, please refer to the rental contract.

fees.title: 2. Fee Standards
fees.content: Rent: Based on the price marked for each available parking space on the rental system homepage map!

rules.title: Rental Rules
items: Flexible rental period, monthly or yearly options available
Apply 3 days in advance for renewal
Notify 3 days in advance for early termination
Rent calculated based on actual usage days
